pageContext.claim: “Under the OBiden administration, our agents were ordered to ignore the law and release illegal aliens by the hundreds of thousands.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a matter of perspective, perhaps, but Obama was known as a the "deporter-in-chief" until he announced a new policy that focused on "prosecutorial discretion," which meant identifying “low priority” cases and advising local ICE attorneys to “administratively close,” not terminate, those proceedings. The goal was to focus on cases involving violent criminals.
